gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.ferret.server
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.ferret.server.Task
public class Task
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper for invoking an external process.

Field Summary
protected  java.lang.String[] cmd
          An array of commmands used to create this external process
protected  java.lang.String cmdString
          Command string used to create this external process
protected  java.lang.String[] env
          String array to describe the environment setting for this external process
protected static java.lang.String[] ERROR_INDICATOR
          An array of strings that indicate there is an error in Ferret output
protected  java.lang.StringBuffer output
          Standard output buffer
protected  java.lang.StringBuffer stderr
          Standard error output buffer
protected  long timeLimit
          Default time limit in sec for this external process
protected  java.io.File workDir
          Work directory for this external process

          Sets up an external process.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
         throws AnagramException
Executes the external process, returning when it is finished or when it exceeds the time limit specified in the constructor.

Throws:
AnagramException - If the process fails, or if the output parser finds an error message in the output.

run

public void run(long timeLimit)
         throws AnagramException
Executes the external process, returning when it is finished or when it exceeds the time limit specified.

Parameters:
timeLimit - Overrides the time limit specified in the constructor.
Throws:
AnagramException - If the process fails, or if there is an error message (a line beginning with "error: ") in the output.

getCmd

public java.lang.String getCmd()
Returns a printable string version of the external command.

getOutput

public java.lang.String getOutput()
Returns a string version of the command's console output

buildCmdString

protected java.lang.String buildCmdString(java.lang.String[] cmd)
Builds a command string using an array of commands

finish

protected void finish(java.lang.Process process,
                      long startTime)
               throws AnagramException
Monitors the running process, puts the process's standard output to output and errors output to stderr. Also monitors the process' time limit and output limit, checks if there is any error generated.

Parameters:
process - the running process
startTime - the start time of the process
Throws:
AnagramException - if anything goes wrong

checkErrors

protected void checkErrors()
                    throws AnagramException
Checks if there is an error after the task is completed.

Throws:
AnagramException - if there is any error

findErrorsInStream

protected void findErrorsInStream(java.io.BufferedReader in)
                           throws AnagramException
Look for error information in an input stream. If there is an indication of error, an AnagramException will be thrown.

Throws:
AnagramException
